Author: MagnumLink
Title: [Coming Soon] Magnum Link - MINING | REFINING | TRADING - Precious METALS & GEMS
Body: quote author=Scor Pio link=topic=2233708.msg23439113#msg23439113 date=1508811669] what kind of company is this ? and where is this company based ? [/quote]  Hi there Scor Pio  Thanks for your interest. MagnumLink is a registered Ltd company with significant investment already made in exploration of precious minerals in Sierra Leone.  You can see our draft video here https://youtu.be/lMWHkkgvkBo  Soon our final video will be on our website www.magnumlink.com as you can see we go full steam forward in preparing for the ICO. On our web-site you can find the white paper and other important information.  After watching the draft video, if you have any questions or feedback please provide it to us. You can meet the team preparing the ICO and the work of the company after it directly on Telegram at www.t.me/preciousico  Kind regards MagnumLink team

Author: MagnumLink
Title: [Coming Soon] Magnum Link - MINING | REFINING | TRADING - Precious METALS & GEMS
Body: We mine precious minerals in nature and buy precious minerals from certified sellers to back digital tokens that are supported by the precious minerals.  So, for instance one digital MLG token will be worth 1 gr of gold, 1 MLS token will be worth 1 gr of silver, 1 MLD token will be worth 1 carat of a diamond etc.  The tokens we are going to issue during the ICO are MLTs and provide investors with 50% of the profits we will create by the following activities:  1. Natural mining of precious minerals in Sierra Leone and internationally 2. Exchange fees from our exchange platform and 3. Refining of the precious minerals.  Yes. There will be mining albeit not of a digital coin.  Given our tokes will be Ethereum based while we expect most purchases to come by Bitcoins, there is a way for two types of mining: digital and natural. So we combine both.

Author: Krezz2017
Title: [Coming Soon] Magnum Link - MINING | REFINING | TRADING - Precious METALS & GEMS
Body: Exploration, extraction and processing of minerals is an interesting project. But I would like to know more. A production license is, no? Equipment. Resources. Frames. Where going to make production? How quickly will investments pay off?

Author: MagnumLink
Title: [Coming Soon] Magnum Link - MINING | REFINING | TRADING - Precious METALS & GEMS
Body: Thanks for the high quality questions.  Our team has decades long experience in the field of precious gems and metals. We know too that profit margins in this industry are ENORMOUS.  Our company already has license and part of the resources needed. The production will start in Sierra Leone. But profits will come before that. First we will launch a digital token exchange. This exchange will bring us fees. Also, when someone wants to exchange tokens for gold or diamonds we will charge a fee. So, our exchange platform will bring profits before mining and refining.  We will publish the dates soon along with more info. Our Whitepaper is already online at www.magnumlink.com.  Our official ANN is coming soon.  Thanks for your interest.

Author: MagnumLink
Title: [Coming Soon] Magnum Link - MINING | REFINING | TRADING - Precious METALS & GEMS
Body: A new Ukrainian team in a new country after the Sudan and Mali? I know that in Sierra Leone English companies work about the Ukrainian did not hear. Do you have official registration documents? [/quote]  Hello Ted Kin and thanks for your message. We are very glad you show interest in our work and company.  MagnumLink is a registered Ltd company with a valid license, and you can find more information on our official threads:  You can see our full ANN here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2326062.msg%msg_id% Or the bounty programme here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2326064.0  You can also visit our website here: www.magnumlink.com and get more information about the area we are looking to explore and exploit to the benefit of our investors and ourselves. The team is international, and we have people from more countries. If you see the MediaKit here www.tsm.global/ml you would see that we speak more than 5 different languages. Some of us are from Ukraine.  We are looking forward to all your potential follow up questions.  Kind regards, The MagnumLink Team
